data.title: ReFi Amazonas
data.description:
ReFi Amazon: Education and Action for Regeneration

ReFi Amazonas is an initiative that combines education, technology and environmental action to promote the regeneration of the Amazon rainforest and its communities. Through talks in schools, we seek to raise awareness among children and young people about the importance of the Amazon, its culture, ancestral knowledge and the adoption of Web3 technologies for environmental and social regeneration.

Our work is not limited to theoretical education: we carry out activities such as garbage collection and cleaning of rivers and flood zones, involving the community in the active protection of their environment. In addition, we organize innovative events where attendees can learn about regenerative finance, blockchain and technological tools through immersive experiences, such as the use of augmented reality glasses.

A fortnight ago, we held an event where we educated the community about ReFi and its potential to transform the economy and the environment. With the support of this Gitcoin round, we can expand our impact, reach more schools and communities, and continue to integrate technology as an engine for positive change in the Amazon region.
data.problem:
üåç Climate Change: An Urgent Problem to Address

Climate change is one of the greatest challenges of our time, with devastating effects on ecosystems, communities and biodiversity. The Amazon, the planet's green lung, is at critical risk due to deforestation, pollution and changing weather patterns, affecting not only its inhabitants, but the entire planet.

One of the main problems in the fight against climate change is the lack of connection and coordination between people, communities and projects that seek to generate positive impact.

This is why we are building a platform that connects people with similar interests, facilitating collaboration on regeneration initiatives, environmental education and the adoption of Web3 technologies to finance sustainable solutions.

The Amazon and other vulnerable regions need immediate action and innovative strategies to curb the climate crisis. We believe that the combination of community, technology and education can accelerate change and generate real impact.

With this project, we seek to empower more people to take action, learn and actively participate in the regeneration of the planet.
data.solution:
üåé Our Solution: Education, Community Action and Web3 Technology for Regeneration.
To address the climate crisis and the degradation of the Amazon, we implemented a comprehensive strategy based on education, environmental regeneration and Web3 technology.

üîπ 1. Education for environmental regeneration.
üìö We organize talks and workshops in schools and universities, where we teach about sustainability, regenerative finance and the importance of indigenous ancestral knowledge.
üöÄ We develop interactive and immersive experiences with augmented reality, bringing Web3 closer to communities so they understand how this technology drives climate solutions.
üé§ We run educational events and campaigns that promote awareness of the environmental crisis and solutions based on regeneration and decentralized finance.

üîπ 2. Regeneration and Community Action.
üå± We reforest areas affected by deforestation, planting native trees with the community to restore degraded ecosystems.
üåø We implement community gardens, teaching agroecology and self-sustainability techniques to improve food security and reduce pressure on forests.
‚ôªÔ∏è We promote waste separation programs, promoting the circular economy and preventing tons of waste from reaching the Amazonian rivers and jungles.
üöÆ We organize cleanup days in rivers and flood zones, recovering natural spaces and preventing plastic waste from continuing to contaminate ecosystems.

üîπ 3. Web3 Technology and Regenerative Finance.
üí∞ We promote the use of ReFi (Regenerative Finance) to channel decentralized funds to environmental impact projects in the Amazon.
üåê We connect local communities with Web3, helping them access new economic opportunities and decentralized governance tools.
üí° We organize Web3 education events, demonstrating how blockchain can drive environmental regeneration and financial inclusion of rural communities.

‚ú® Our approach combines education, action and technology to empower communities and restore the Amazon, ensuring a sustainable future for generations to come.

data.name: Regen Coordination
data.description: The Regen Coordination Round is a proposal for a GG21 community round centered on the themes of Coordi-nations 3, Cosmo-localism 2, Bio-Regionalism 3, and Regenerative Finance (ReFi) 3. Bringing together GreenPill Network 1, ReFi DAO 1, Celo Regional DAOs 1 and Regens Unite 1, we aim to support a global movement of regenerative communities leveraging Web3 for real-world impact and addressing local needs. The round will feed into a program to support the further development of local community impact tracking methodologies, grant tooling interoperability, and integrated QF & RPGF. We have currently secured $60K in funding from Celo Public Goods, ReFi DAO and Greenpill and ask for Gitcoin‚Äôs backing as we embark on a shared mission to showcase how community coordination, Web3, and innovative financial mechanisms can enable ecological and social regeneration on a global scale.
